responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "D44A83B448C27C85FA4A348CC3D3D5A7", "The Kyronic Order of Puritans was formed to combat worldwide plagues in the name of the god of Healing, Kyronu. Most Plague Doctors are welcomed into quarrantined towns, but not the Puritans. These holy knights were feared for their quick and merciless actions performed to end the spread of any plague upon a population. They were known to seize infected and perform forced bloodletting that were nothing short of torture. Those were the lucky ones. Most infected were rapidly exterminated and set ablaze. ")
name: MIDD_0016_TPP_Book_KyronicHistory_3
